item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/11/30/errbot/#comment-4402">julien</a>.
The ability for a bot to inject news items into a channel from an RSS feed would definitely be a nice addition.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien.

The ability for a bot to inject news items into a channel from an RSS feed would definitely be a nice addition.

item.title: By: julien
item.dc:creator: julien
item.description: Pretty cool! Let's see if I can create a Superfeedr plugin to subscribe to RSS feeds :)
item.content:encoded: Pretty cool! Let’s see if I can create a Superfeedr plugin to subscribe to RSS feeds ðŸ™‚
